section.title: Context
section.p: Created in 2013 with an over $100 million investment, The Moss Arts Center is a theater that host various artist from around the world with pieces ranging from music, singing, dancing, art shows, period pieces and many more. The Anne and Ellen Fife Theatre within the Street and Davis Performance Hall, seats 1,260 people all together!

li.p: Has seen performers like Kristen Chenoweth, Renee Elise Goldsberry, circuses, plays and more
